entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain or wet snow early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 9 April 2023
